[00:00.00]Love Scars 3 (Explicit) - Trippie Redd
[00:02.47]Lyrics by：Michael Lamar White II
[00:04.95]Composed by：Michael Lamar White II
[00:07.42]Produced by：OZ/Reske
[00:09.90]Yeah
[00:10.75]Shawty do not play no games with me
[00:13.28]Yeah that sh*t is lame to me
[00:16.53]Spend every night and every day with me
[00:19.37]We gon' be aight just take the pain with me yeah
[00:23.54]Baby stay with me
[00:25.42]Yeah baby stay with me
[00:28.23]Yeah baby stay with me
[00:31.26]Yeah baby stay with me yeah
[00:37.19]Your love is a drug I'd like to try today
[00:43.01]Your love from above I need it always
[00:49.07]You the reason why I'm waking up smiling
[00:51.79]I could really give two fucks about a diamond
[00:54.67]No matter what when we together bae we shining
[00:57.58]To the top baby we climbing yeah
[01:02.74]You ain't going nowhere
[01:05.38]You ain't going nowhere yeah
